intents.text: I found the movie extremely disappointing and a complete waste of time.
The service at the restaurant was terrible, the food was cold and tasteless.
I regretted buying the product as soon as I opened the package, it was cheaply made and didn't work properly.
The hotel room was small, dirty and smelled like cigarettes, it was a horrible experience.
The customer support was unhelpful, they didn't solve my issue and were rude on the phone.
I had high expectations for the concert but it turned out to be a complete disaster, the sound was terrible and the artist was late.
The book was a waste of money, the plot was boring and the characters were one-dimensional.
The game was full of bugs and glitches, it was unplayable and frustrating.
The website was slow and difficult to navigate, it was a terrible user experience.
The trip was a disaster, the hotel was overbooked and we had to sleep on the floor, and the tour guide was unprofessional and unprepared.
The weather is so gloomy and depressing today.
I got stuck in traffic for hours, it was a complete nightmare.
The new restaurant in town was a huge disappointment, the food was bland and overpriced.
The package I ordered arrived damaged and broken, it was a waste of money.
The concert tickets were way too expensive, and the seats were terrible, it was not worth it.
The job interview went terribly, I completely choked and forgot all my answers.
The vacation was a disaster, the hotel was dirty and noisy, and the food was terrible.
The software I bought was full of bugs and errors, it was unusable.
The movie was so bad that I walked out of the theater, it was a complete waste of time.
The product I received was not what I ordered, it was a frustrating experience.
I couldn't finish the book, the writing was terrible and the story was boring.
The party was a disaster, the music was too loud and the guests were rude.
The new haircut I got is terrible, the stylist completely messed it up.
I burned dinner and set off the smoke alarm, it was a complete disaster.
I lost my phone and all my important data, it's a complete nightmare.
The flight was delayed for hours and I missed my connecting flight, it was a terrible experience.
The concert was overbooked and overcrowded, it was impossible to enjoy.
The hotel room was dirty and smelled bad, it was a terrible stay.
I failed my exam and now I have to retake the whole course.
The party was so boring and the food was terrible.
I had a terrible headache all day, it was impossible to focus.
The concert was cancelled at the last minute, it was such a disappointment.
The customer service was terrible, they were rude and unhelpful.
The traffic was so bad that I was late for my important meeting.
The hotel room had bed bugs, it was a nightmare.
The package I received was missing items, it was a frustrating experience.
The computer crashed and I lost all my work, it was a disaster.
The concert was overpriced and the sound quality was terrible.
The new employee is completely incompetent, it's frustrating to work with them.
My car broke down in the middle of nowhere and I had to wait for hours for a tow truck.
The movie was a total waste of time, it had a terrible plot and acting.
The restaurant was extremely busy and understaffed, the service was terrible.
I missed my flight because of a delayed connecting flight, it was a nightmare.
The product I ordered online arrived damaged and unusable, it was a huge disappointment.
The weather was terrible on my vacation, it rained every day.
The software crashed and I lost all my important data, it was a disaster.
The traffic was so bad that I missed my important appointment, it was frustrating.
The new haircut I got was terrible, I hate the way it looks.
The package I received was delivered to the wrong address, it was a huge inconvenience.
The hotel I stayed at had bed bugs, it was disgusting and ruined my trip.
